text: The Greensboro Urban Loop is a Interstate Highway beltway that encircles Greensboro, North Carolina, United States. The Urban Loop travels I-73, I-85, I-785, I-840, and US 421. It is usually located within Greensboro city limits, though it often crosses the city line. The Urban Loop was completed at January 23, 2023. ==References== Category:Roads in North Carolina Category:Greensboro, North Carolina
title: Greensboro Urban Loop
